DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate blood pressure 6 week treatment COZAAR plus .
DOC.brief_title: An Open Label Study Assess Efficacy , Safety Tolerability COZAAR Plus ( Losartan Potassium 50mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5mg ) Possibly Titrated COZAAR Plus-F ( Losartan Potassium 100mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 25mg ) Patients With Essential Hypertension ( 0954A-325 )
DOC.criteria: Patient treat valsartan 80mg irbesartan 150mg vandesartan 8mg least 4 week prior visit 1 Patient systolic blood pressure 140 159 mmhg diastolic pressure 90 99mmhg take visit 1 History angina pectoris stabilize past 6 week History clinically significant abnormal lab result diseases Myocardial infarction within past 6 month Stroke past 6 month
